long_description: Long is the night, especially when you're caught without the proper tools. The Gerber Daily Carry Zip Light keeps illumination handy when you're at home or miles from nowhere. Compact size and a reliable clip let you attach the light to a zipper, pack or keychain and then forget about it-until you really need a light. Quick-release clip lets you remove the light with one hand, so you can use your other hand to reach whatever you're looking for. White LED puts off enough lumens to read without waking a sleeping tentmate, or to navigate back to your car after dusk. Zipper loop attachment; bottle opener; two replaceable lithium batteries. The Gerber Daily Carry Zip Light features stainless steel construction for durability.
short_description: Long is the night, especially when you're caught without the proper tools. The Gerber Daily Carry Zip Light keeps illumination handy when you're at home or miles from nowhere.
